typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> movies
Filter1 derive(movie = '999979') ~> DerivedColumn1
movies filter(title == 'Toy Story') ~> Filter1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('dynamicRange', 10,
		year
	)) ~> sink1
